xwikidoc.name: UserProfileTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: User Profile Translations
xwikidoc.content:
XWiki.XWikiUsers_displayHiddenDocuments.hint=The wiki contains documents that are not displayed by default. These hidden documents represent technical content, like application classes, configuration pages, macros, styles, scripts, etc. XWiki.XWikiUsers_underline.hint=Choose if links should be underlined. XWiki.XWikiUsers_timezone.hint=Use a specific timezone so that the dates reflect your current location. XWiki.XWikiUsers_editor.hint=Choose what editor will be the default one, overriding the default editor set globally. If not defined, a default editor is chosen, depending on what is being edited. XWiki.XWikiUsers_usertype.hint=Choose what type of user will be the default one. Advanced users will have access to multiple editing features, terminal page creation, etc. XWiki.XWikiUsers_extensionConflictSetup.hint=Indicate if you want Extension Manager to ask you to confirm conflict resolution default rules (for example tell Extension Manager to ask you what to do if the document to upgrade has been removed from the wiki). userprofile.default=Default user.profile.groups.title=Groups user.profile.groups.description=Here are listed all the groups your user belongs to. user.profile.groups.table.group=Group platform.core.profile.category.groups=Groups user.profile.notifications=Notifications user.profile.network.unfollow.question=Are you sure you want to unfollow this user? user.profile.network.unfollow.question.yes=Yes, unfollow user.profile.network.unfollow.question.no=No, cancel user.profile.network.following=Following user.profile.network.notfollowing=Not following user.profile.network.follow=Start following user.profile.network.unfollow=Stop following user.profile.network.done=Done user.profile.network.saving=Saving... user.profile.network.error=Error saving the notification setting user.profile.status.done=Done user.profile.status.saving=Saving... user.profile.status.error=Error saving the user status
platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences=Keyboard Shortcut Preferences platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.hint=These are the shortcut keys associated with each command. When setting the value of this preference empty, the shortcut will be unbound completely. Only simple keyboard shortcuts (one key) are supported right now. platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.editModes=Edit modes platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.editModes.hint=Shortcuts to edit the current page with a specific editor. Only available as an advanced user. platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.viewInfos=View page informations platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.viewInfos.hint=Shortcuts to access additional page information or alternative view modes. Only available as an advanced user. platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.pageActions=Page actions platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.pageActions.hint=Shortcuts to start an action on the current page. Only available as an advanced user. platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.editorActions=Editor actions platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.editorActions.hint=Shortcuts accessible when editing a page. It's highly recommended to use composite shortcuts like Alt+C to avoid triggering the shortcut while typing in a field. platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.developerShortcuts=Developer shortcuts platform.core.profile.section.shortcutPreferences.developerShortcuts.hint=Shortcuts for advanced actions included for developer convenience. Only simple key shortcuts are supported in this parameter, no sequence.
platform.core.profile.shortcut.button.reset=Reset platform.core.profile.shortcut.hint.unbound=Unbound
platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.edit=Default edit mode platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.wiki=Wiki edit mode platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.wysiwyg=Wysiwyg edit mode platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.inline=Inline edit mode platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.rights=Rights edit mode platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.objects=Objects edit mode platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.class=Class edit mode
platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.comments=View page comments platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.annotations=View page annotations platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.attachments=View page attachments platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.history=View page history platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.information=View page information platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.code=View page code
platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.delete=Delete the page platform.core.profile.shortcut.view.rename=Rename the page
platform.core.profile.shortcut.edit.preview=See preview from the editor platform.core.profile.shortcut.edit.backtoedit=Go back to the editor from preview platform.core.profile.shortcut.edit.cancel=Cancel edition platform.core.profile.shortcut.edit.save=Save platform.core.profile.shortcut.edit.saveandview=Save and view
platform.core.profile.shortcut.dev.usertype=Switch the current user type platform.core.profile.shortcut.dev.hiddendocs=Toggle hidden documents
platform.core.profile.shortcut.notifications.update.successful=Updated shortcut preference platform.core.profile.shortcut.notifications.update.failed=Failed to save shortcut preference platform.core.profile.shortcut.notifications.reset.successful=Reset shortcut preference platform.core.profile.shortcut.notifications.reset.failed=Failed to reset shortcut preference
## Used to indicate where deprecated keys start #@deprecatedstart
## Deprecated since 16.3.0RC1 XWiki.XWikiUsers_accessibility.hint=Extra accessibility will enable various visual enhancements like: bigger fonts, underlined links, etc.
## Used to indicate where deprecated keys end #@deprecatedend
